Class MailListUser

public class MailListUser
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class is the domain object corresponding to the mail_list_users table in the database.

getMemberUsers

public static java.util.ArrayList<User> getMemberUsers(int aMailListId)
This method completely expands all the mailing lists present within this mailing list as members recursively and returns the final list of users.

Parameters:
aMailListId - Id of Mailing list to be recursively expanded.
Returns:
List of member users.
